overview: Obese 12-year-old Wojtek is ashamed of himself and his mother, who runs a rundown grocery. On a bad hair day, the boy rebels against his mother, but instead of making her change, he humiliates her.

production_companies.name: Państwowa Wyższa Szkoła Filmowa, Telewizyjna i Teatralna w Łodzi

title: Fruits and Vegetables
